proyects.title: Paint
proyects.description: Is a tool for drawing and editing images.

proyects.title: Connect Four
proyects.description: It's a strategy game where two players take turns dropping colored discs into a vertical board with 6 rows and 7 columns. The objective is to connect four discs of the same color in a straight line, either horizontally, vertically, or diagonally, before the other player does.
